name: Far Lands (itch)
description:
Find your way within those increasingly chaotic lands. You might fall, but will you rise again to reach the highest heights ?

Controls

[Arrows] to move
[Space] to jump, hold to jump higher

[Shift+S] if you're stuck
[Shift+R] to restart
[Shift+M] to stop the music

Bottom right button to go fullscreen (and then click anywhere)

The game takes less than 10 min to complete.

Credits

I used pre-existing art and music.
Art : beautiful asset packs of Smaex and o_lobster.
Music : Thunderbird by C418
Game made with the Godot Engine.

Note

This game was made in a week for the Brakeys Game Jam, with the theme "Let There Be Chaos". For my second jam, I initially wanted to create a more original platformer, but I struggled with the physics, so I went for a simple and atmospheric adventure in a chaotic environment. Still, it's very buggy. Turned out quite rage inducing too.
